entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
